author: Gloria Casas
title: Arrest made in shooting of tow truck driver in Elgin Elgin Courier-News
text:
A 21-year-old South Elgin man has been charged with aggravated battery with a firearm in the shooting of a tow truck driver early Sunday in Elgin, police said.
Devonte L. Montgomery, of the 1100 block of West Kane Street, was arrested following an investigation into the shooting, which took place about 1:50 a.m. in the 1200 block of Fleetwood Drive, according to a news release. The 45-year-old victim works for a tow relocation service, police said.
According to reports, the victim and another person had gotten into a verbal altercation, and the victim was then shot. The victim was taken to a hospital with non-life-threatening injuries, police said.
Montgomery was later identified as the other person, police said. Investigators found the handgun allegedly used in the shooting at the scene, police said.
Montgomery was scheduled to appear in bond court Monday.
Gloria Casas is a freelance reporter.
